testcase.name: Scenario-1: Music tracks API availablity and performance
testcase.system-out: Given 'Jo' wants to browse music tracks.....................................passed When 'Jo' requests music tracks.............................................passed Then she should get a list of music tracks..................................passed And the response should be received within 2 seconds........................passed

testcase.name: Scenario-2: Each track has a unique ID and segment type music
testcase.system-out: Given 'Jo' wants to browse music tracks.....................................passed When 'Jo' requests music tracks.............................................passed Then each track should have a unique ID.....................................passed And each track segment type should be "music"...............................passed

testcase.name: Scenario-3: Each track has a primary title
testcase.system-out: Given 'Jo' wants to browse music tracks.....................................passed When 'Jo' requests music tracks.............................................passed Then each track should have a primary title.................................passed

testcase.name: Scenario-4: Only one track is currently playing
testcase.system-out: Given 'Jo' wants to browse music tracks.....................................passed When 'Jo' requests music tracks.............................................passed Then only one track should have now playing as true.........................passed

testcase.name: Scenario-5: Response header date is today

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "Date" was not "Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:59:30 GMT", was "Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:59:31 GMT". Headers are: Server=nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu) Content-Type=application/json Transfer-Encoding=chunked Connection=keep-alive Cache-Control=max-age=30, public, s-maxage=30, stale-if-error=7200, stale-while-revalidate=7200 Date=Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:59:31 GMT Pragma=public X-RateLimit-Limit=60 X-RateLimit-Remaining=55
